programme.title: Wildest Africa: Madagascar: Islands of Monsters
programme.desc: Madagascar is truly a weird and wonderful land. Isolated on an island of extreme and magical looking locations, life has adapted and diversified. With few predators, numbers have proliferated and natural selection has gone mad.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Okavango: Water in the Desert
programme.desc: The Okavango Delta, a huge emerald oasis in the burning heart of the Kalahari desert, is fed by the Okavango River and this perpetual cycle of wet and dry is the lifeblood of this extraordinary natural Eden.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Arctic Ocean: The Frozen Sea
programme.desc: The film follows a year in the High Arctic, where life is exceptionally entwined with the seasons. Journey to the Arctic where in winter, the sun doesn't rise for months on end, but in the summer thaws out in an explosion of life.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Coast of the Whalesharks
programme.desc: On the remote coastline of Australia’s northwest, there are great natural wonders to be found. Above the sea on this sunbaked coast, there is very little; only a sparse landscape shaped by the arid conditions. But here, the miracle reveals itself…

programme.title: Wildest India: India's Lost World
programme.desc: North-east India is an anthropological paradise; there is no other place on Earth with so many different ethnic groups. The forest are filled with mysterious tribes whose lives are dictated by the rain and the seasonal fruits of the forest.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, a high-priced and ruthless jury "consultant" will stop at nothing to secure a verdict on an explosive trial.

programme.title: The Last Legion

programme.title: The Ninth Gate

programme.title: Swamp Diamonds
programme.desc: An undercover police woman infiltrates a group of hardened female criminals who plan to break out of prison and retrieve diamonds from a swamp.

programme.title: The Rebel Set

programme.desc: Ian jumps into building the back of the car.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian works with a wild idea for the rear design.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian builds with a variety of parts to design the front end.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian tries to turn a crazy concept into reality and complete the front end.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian builds through a major issue with the roof.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.title: Andromeda: The Others
programme.desc: The Andromeda gets caught in a war between two ships -- and it includes a fatal disease.

programme.title: Andromeda: Fear Burns Down to Ashes
programme.desc: Dylan is tricked by Rev and kidnapped. The crew finds an unexpected ally in a Collector.

programme.title: Andromeda: Lost in a Space That Isn't There
programme.desc: The Abyss has infected Beka. The crew must find a way to save her.

programme.title: Andromeda: Abridging the Devil's Divide
programme.desc: After some of the crew is captured, Harper is forced to work on a time bridge for the Patriarch.

programme.title: Andromeda: Trusting the Gordian Maze
programme.desc: A spy from Tri Gemma shows up on the Andromeda in an attempt to steal the star map.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: “Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to connect with the spirit of 53-year-old, Cynthia Greenwood-Smith, to unravel the lies and discover the grim truth surrounding her disappearance from her Gold Coast home in 2001.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: In 1957, nine-year-old Peter Boland was on holiday having the time of his life on a remote farm in New Zealand when he simply vanished without a trace. Peter’s older brother Gavin Boland, a self-confessed sceptic, turns to Sensing Murder’s psychics.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost for Words
programme.desc: Spirited teenager Jayne Furlong dreamed of becoming a child psychologist - instead, she ended up a prostitute. In 1993, 17 year old Jayne vanished from her patch on Auckland's Karangahape Road.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: 19-year-old Joan Wech left New Zealand for the bright lights of Sydney. But the first step on her overseas adventure would be her last. Was this a robbery gone wrong, a savage random attack or a revenge killing by a jealous ex-lover?

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Kimberley Killer
programme.desc: Seven years after the disappearance of baby Azaria Chamberlain at Ayers rock, long before the murder of Peter Falconio on a remote stretch of highway in the Australian outback and two years before Ivan Milat begins his reign of backpacker murders.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Thrill Kill: The Janine Balding Murder
programme.desc: On a September night in 1986, two police officers climbed through a barbed-wire fence beside the F4 freeway at Minchinbury in Sydney’s west.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Murder of Innocence: Sian Kingi
programme.desc: On 27 November 1987, 12-year-old Noosa school girl Sian Kingi was grabbed off her push bike by Valmae Fay Beck and Barrie John Watts as she rode home from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.desc: A chilling investigation of John Ernest Cribb, who on August 11, 1978 broke into the home of the Connell's. On a winter’s afternoon, Valda Connell and her four-year-old son Damien arrived home after having collected ten-year-old Sally from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No Mercy: The Killing of Virginia Morse
programme.desc: The horrific story of killers Allan Baker and Kevin Crump who began their murderous spree in rural NSW by killing a complete stranger for $20, a packet of cigarettes and a couple of litres of petrol.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Biting The Bullet
programme.desc: A STORY: Regan returns to Drovers Run with a devastating secret - two miners died when she signed off on explosions as mine manager. Hoping to heal, Regan asks if she can stay.B STORY: Through an accident, Fiona discovers she is infertile.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Second Best
programme.desc: A STORY: When The Colonel is stolen, Regan goes out of her way to help a 14 year old sheep duffer, as a way of assuaging her guilt over the dead miner's families.B STORY: Alex asks Stevie to be his best man...and Stevie ends up as Fiona's bridesmaid.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Trouble With Harry
programme.desc: A STORY: Jodi believes she has killed Harry Ryan in a car accident. Facing manslaughter charges, it is later revealed that Harry died of a heart attack.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Legend of Harry Ryan
programme.desc: A STORY: Alex learns the real story of Harry's life - an orphan, abandoned by his adoptive parents and determined to create a new name and life. The Ryan empire is based on a myth.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Second Chances
programme.desc: A STORY: Jodi's 'father' Kevin returns wanting to get his daughter back - but Jodi is devastated to learn he is using her for her inheritance money.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: French Quarter Phantoms
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to America's most haunted city, New Orleans, to investigate the Old U.S. Mint.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Voices of Pain
programme.desc: On this episode TAPS heads back to the fan favorite; Waverly Hills Sanatorium in Louisville, Kentucky, an abandoned tuberculosis hospital haunted by its former patients and staff.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Garden State Asylum
programme.desc: The TAPS team travels to New Jersey to investigate the infamous Essex County Hospital.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 4
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Club Dead
programme.desc: The TAPS team travels south to Ybor City, Florida to the historic Cuban Club.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Buyer Beware
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Naples, New York, to investigate the Naples Hotel.This hotel was built in 1895.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Greed is Good
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tears for Fears
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa wakes up in a jail cell, but ignores the ensuing media frenzy in order to befriend a woman waging a personal battle against drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Picture This
programme.desc: A fugitive with a long criminal record has fled to Hawaii, and the bondsman on the mainland has asked Dog for help. Dog doesn't have much information to work with, but he can use the felon's desire to impress his friends to track him down.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tag, You're It
programme.desc: To his traditional bounty hunting tools of confidential informants, canvassing, and silver-tongued subterfuge the world's greatest bounty hunter has added Facebook! A word to the wise for those on the run-post at your own peril, the Dog is watching!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Training Day
programme.desc: While the team tries to handle the bond that newcomer Alysin wrote incorrectly, sparks are flying between Beth and Duane Lee when he questions Beth's decision to go on the hunt without Dog leading the charge!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cutting the Apron Strings
programme.desc: Two different young men both have a bad habit of missing their court dates. Looking over their files Dog senses that they have another trait in common, both are a little too tied to their mothers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Burger Commander
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: G.I. Si
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old G.I. Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier. To settle the score, Willie and Jase head out to the woods with their friends and children for a paintball match.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jase and the Argonauts
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working. But when Jase thinks this is unfair, he takes matters into his own hands and finds a better object to use as motivation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Playhouse
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep themselves. But the playhouse ends up looking more like a military-style duck blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Living the Dream
programme.desc: Beat builds a lottery winner’s 7,000-sq.ft. dream home in northern Alberta. Meanwhile, Peter must beg, borrow and steal to deliver on two high profile entryways for Canada’s Winter Games.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Night Sweats
programme.desc: Beat battles a stuck truck in the middle of the night, then builds in darkness to meet his deadline on a home in northern Ontario.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Log Building for Dummies
programme.desc: Joel pinch hits in Oregon, by building a home he’s never seen before using a crane he hopes he’ll never see again.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: San Pedro Prison, La Paz, Bolivia
programme.desc: Imagine a prison so fierce that guards stay outside for fear of their lives. Inside, the prisoners are in control: murderers, violent offenders, drug bosses. The inmates rule and anarchy prevails. Only the strongest survive this lawless place.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: Dallas County Jail, Dallas. Texas, USA
programme.desc: The Dallas County Jail in Texas - a supersized facility with beds for 7,100 inmates. The biggest threat in the prison? Turf wars. With the surplus of inmates, there is less space to divide up between them, leading to relentless gang warfare.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Takashia says Brendon doesn’t approve of her friends, doesn’t trust her and is controlling. Brendon says he can’t trust Takashia because she is a nonstop attention seeker and never passes up an opportunity to flirt with men.

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Punisher
programme.desc: Shea says Jessica constantly punishes him due her history of cheating exes. She must know where Shea is every second forcing his friends to cut ties. Jessica has caught Shea lying to her in the past. Can Judge Lynn Toler get them on track?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Fantasy Fail
programme.desc: Victoria is sick of Casey neglecting his responsibilities. Casey feels like a slave for taking care of the kids while she flies around the world for modeling gigs. Can Casey break out of the Mr. Mom role and start helping with the bills?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: When the going got tough, Dermartess left his children and Rofiesha. Dermartess says Rofiesha forced him to leave 7 years ago. He still loves her and wants to see his children but believes she was too toxic. Can Judge Lynn Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Super Freak
programme.desc: Khasha says Jermaine is always too busy for her and doesn't respect her. Jermaine says his young girlfriend wants sex all the time and is extremely messy! Can Judge Toler help them find a middle ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Girl Summer
programme.desc: Shortly after tying the knot Diana gave Robert an ultimatum: they'd either have an open relationship or she was gone. He wants to save the marriage, but she isn't ready to compromise. Can Diana finally settle with one man, or is this really the end?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Firecracker
programme.desc: Gary claims Ebony's verbally abusive, acts like a dictator and is frustrated with her disrespectful comments. She loves Gary very much and claims to be a 'ride or die' girlfriend, but is over Gary's unmotivated, stuck in the mud ways.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tamika and Joseph have been together 7 years before marrying, but now his gambling addiction plus their new baby has worn the two out. Joseph’s excessive gambling habits are draining their life’s savings and he refuses to get the help he needs.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tapped Out
programme.desc: Lataisha says Chris smokes weed all day and can’t keep a job. Things seemed to be going fine until one day she walked downstairs in their home and realized that Chris moved out. Chris says he left because she is too aggressive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: I Scream U Scream
programme.desc: Sharee moved in with Brandon shortly after they met, had a child and still no marriage. Brandon wants her to get a full-time job and not work part-time in their business before they get married.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Hunt for Santa
programme.desc: Dog decides he needs to help his son Garry believe in Santa Claus again. So now the Dog, with a posse expanded to include his children and grandchildren, sets off on a hunt through the Colorado Rockies for Santa Claus himself!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Call Waiting
programme.desc: Dog's target for today has been in trouble with the law since he was a juvenile. And he seems willing to use any trick in the system to avoid capture by Dog. In this match of wits, will Dog prevail?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Kid Stuff
programme.desc: A fugitive from justice is on the lam and it's Dog's job to find him. When they hit the last known address they discover he already has pulled up stakes and left no forwarding address. The posse's one hope is to locate his girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Easy Does It
programme.desc: There is a running joke in the posse that every time Bobby Brown asks them for help with a fugitive, he always promises them it's "an easy one," but the hunts end up being epic searches.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Dog believes in safety first, and today's hunt puts this philosophy to the test. The fugitive's problem with anger management increases the dangers of their already risky line of work. Dog warns the crew to be ready for anything as they head out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back in the Hood
programme.desc: Today, Dog's bounty is about to take him on a trip down memory lane and test his investigative chops. With each lead propelling him closer and closer to his childhood haunts, Dog uses old-fashioned detective skills to track his prey.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Road
programme.desc: Dog is a big-hearted guy. He's helping Mary Ellen, his friend and fellow bondsman, on a dangerous night hunt for a fugitive she is now regretting bailing out. He's also giving his nephew Justin a second chance to rejoin the team.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: True Identity
programme.desc: Dog knows that looks can be deceiving. The fugitive is pretty, petite, and trouble. She stands accused of settling an argument with the help of a box cutter. What Dog does not anticipate is how deceptive this femme fatale can truly be!

programme.title: Operation Repo: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: A professional stunt driver slips through Froy and Sonia's grasp, sending them on a violent high-speed chase. Matt offends a pretty RO who seeks womanly revenge, and Froy and Carlos go undercover at a lowrider show.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Finale
programme.desc: On this special one-hour series finale of Operation Repo, the team is scrambling to get ready for the huge Yacht repo to secure the sale of the company and the distribution of their severance packages, while still going after everyday repos.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Snoop, There It Is
programme.desc: Lynn snoops into Sivad’s past.

programme.title: Girlfriends: You Ain't Gotta Go Home, But…You know The Rest!
programme.desc: Toni’s brother, Antoine, visits Maya – and refuses to leave

programme.title: Girlfriends: Hopelessly Devoted to Two
programme.desc: Ellis’ return forces Joan to confront her feelings for Brock.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Inherit the Lynn
programme.desc: Lynn moves in with Maya.

programme.title: Girlfriends: And Baby Makes Four
programme.desc: William has second thoughts about fatherhood.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Viva Las Vegas
programme.desc: Joan hears wedding bells – but are they all in her mind?

programme.title: Girlfriends: Between Brock and a Hard Place
programme.desc: Brock shocks Joan with news that could end their engagement.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Don't You Want Me Baby?
programme.desc: When Toni revisits the past, it could destroy her future with Todd.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Merry Ex-Mas
programme.desc: Maya claims she’s over Darnell – but is she?

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: At Seven
programme.desc: Karen is convinced that she needs closure in order to move on. (S3, ep16)

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Cemetery
programme.desc: PRS visits a gothic graveyard, where a jealous spirit seems to be preying on the newlywed wife of the cemetery's caretaker. Ryan traces the haunting to a mysterious, unclaimed cremation urn on the grounds.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Freshmen Fear
programme.desc: A young female student claims to have seen a ghost in her dorm room.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Good Vs. Evil
programme.desc: PRS visits a western Pennsylvania couple wracked by a torrent of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Woman in the Window
programme.desc: Ryan and his team lend paranormal assistance to a family who lives in a historic home that was once a part of the Underground Railroad. Does the answer to their haunting lie in the mysterious tunnels beneath the house?

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Messenger
programme.desc: Kelli and her husband Riley are frightened in their coastal Oregon home. They are plagued by a headless apparition and often hear mysterious noises that resemble cries for help from the dark corners of their house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghosts of the Forgotten
programme.desc: The PRS investigation into the haunted Lake County Poor House becomes a journey through one PRS team members? troubled past.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Homecoming
programme.desc: Ryan brings PRS to his hometown of Sumter, SC to investigate a chilling case where a young boy was tragically shot and killed on a front doorstep while trick-or-treating on Halloween.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Family Ties
programme.desc: Jimmie is haunted by the apparition of a mysterious old woman who peers at him in the bathroom of his family's Petersburg, VA home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: When Paula's young autistic son Michael, with limited verbal skills uttered the words "Go away scary dead boy" -- it sent a chill up her spine.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Walton Hall
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team visit a gem in the Cheshire countryside where a disembodied voice brings disarray to the investigation and something in the cellar fills Yvette with fear and dread.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oak House
programme.desc: Yvette takes her team to Oak House, said to be one of the most haunted places in West Bromwich. Fear and fright take hold when something seems to follow them and one experience changes the belief of both Glen and Karl.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Middleton Hall
programme.desc: Yvette and her team are called to a grade II listed building that spans over 900 years in an attempt to uncover the mysterious paranormal activity that is said to occur there.

programme.title: Most Haunted: HMP Shrewsbury Part 1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding and her team take on their biggest challenge yet in a prison where many have lost their lives and some seem to have remained.

programme.title: Most Haunted: HMP Shrewsbury Part 2
programme.desc: Part two of this mammoth investigation takes the team to the condemned cell and execution room. Is it a hangman or one of the executed souls that makes itself present and causes the team to re-evaluate what they are doing.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Basinger's New York
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark's assignment at Christmastime is to show a disillusioned columnist that there's still some good out there.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: All That Glitters
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark pose as priests in order to re-open an abandoned church as a shelter when a major fire breaks out in a neighborhood.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Wally
programme.desc: Wally is a hobo and street puppeteer whose caring and goodness have made him an angel without him knowing it.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Song of Songs
programme.desc: A struggling pianist tries to start life again after a heart attack.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Night to Remember
programme.desc: High school seniors hope they get the dates they want for prom.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Mother and a Daughter

programme.title: World's Greatest: Drives
programme.desc: A journey by road expands our horizons, allowing us to explore the depth and breadth of whole countries and continents, stopping whenever and wherever we chose.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanoes
programme.desc: There are few sights on earth as compelling as a volcanic eruption. Volcanoes have the potential to cause death and widespread destruction in a heartbeat, but they also give rise to new life and ecosystems.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Extreme Animals
programme.desc: Extreme Animals features environments hostile to humans, but havens to many animals. Witness gorgeous glow-worms, high flying condors, parched thorny devils, emperor penguins, and polar bears in this journey through life on the edge.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Land Adventures
programme.desc: Most land adventures come with some risk - a chance to confront our deepest fears, resist the pull of the ordinary, and soar into the wild unknown.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Jungle Animals
programme.desc: Encounter gorillas and orangutans, killer tree-dwelling pythons, delightful monkeys, awe-inspiring tigers, and millions of land-dwelling red crabs in Australia, the islands of Southeast Asia, Africa, and the Amazon.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., Queen of the Comeback/In My Africa
programme.desc: The Tibbles tease, D.W. fires back, the Tibbles taunt, D.W. has a snappy comeback, and round and round they go! Will it ever end? Then, D.W.'s new classmate, Cheikh, is Brain's young cousin…and is also from Senegal, Africa!

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'S Stray Netkitin/Bats in the Belfry
programme.desc: D.W. is panicked when a virus ruins the Read family computer. Who will take care of her virtual pet? Arthur and D.W. are thrilled when Grandma Thora lets them turn her attic into a clubhouse. But will a bat threaten their new play space?

programme.title: Arthur: Mr. Ratburn's Secret Identity/Besties
programme.desc: Mysterious calls. Superhuman strength. Is Mr. Ratburn secretly a superhero? When Buster and Ladonna bond over a memorable trip to the movies, Arthur feels left out. Has Ladonna taken his place as Buster's best bud?

programme.title: Arthur: Blabbermouth/All Grown Up
programme.desc: Buster is hurt when he learns his friends don't trust him to keep a secret. Then, the gang finds a mysterious fortune telling game at the library and gets a hint of what their futures could hold.

programme.title: Arthur: Speak Up Francine/Waiting for Snow
programme.desc: The local creek is polluted and pesticide run-off is to blame. Francine is determined to get the word out at the annual Earth Day rally. Ladonna can't wait to experience her first blizzard, if only the weather would cooperate.

programme.title: Arthur: The Chronicles of Buster/On this Spot
programme.desc: Buster learns that special effects can't take the place of hard work when conquering real mountains. Arthur is thrilled to find out that Sitting Bull once passed through town! He rallies the residents to mark the spot with a monument.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Goes To Camp/Buster Makes The Grade
programme.desc: Arthur and his friends go to summer camp where it's strictly boys vs. girls. Next, Buster Baxter is everyone's favorite jokester. Unfortunately, though, Buster's grades aren't as good as his jokes, and Buster may have to repeat third grade.

programme.title: Arthur: April 9th
programme.desc: April 9th is a normal day until a fire destroys the teacher's lounge and forces Lakewood Elementary to close. This unexpected event finds creates a wide range of emotional reactions, for Arthur, his friends and teachers, and the community.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Weighs In/The Law of the Jungle Gym
programme.desc: When Arthur doesn't fit into his costume for the play, he's shocked to learn that he's gotten "husky-sized." He gets serious about getting in shape. Muffy found the perfect place to take pictures with her new digital camera: the jungle gym.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: D-Day (June 6,1944)
programme.desc: D-Day, the 6th of June--one of the most pivotal moments in world history. In a massive armada of thousands of ships, 3,000,000 allied troops land at Three Beaches in Normandy, France.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Retaking France
programme.desc: Six weeks after the D-Day invasion of the Beaches of Normandy, the allied forces are pushing the Germans back through the French countryside. Town by town is won back as Panzer divisions retreat back to the Meuse River.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Operation Dragoon (August 1944)
programme.desc: The Allies break into France and push the Germans back to their own border.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Liberation of the Paris
programme.desc: Both political and military expediency were factors in the return of the French capital to its people.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Arnhem
programme.desc: The Allies launch an attack designed to push the Germans back to the Rhine River.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory
programme.desc: Gen. Douglas MacArthur's return to the Philippines, and the final push to retake the islands after two years of Japanese occupation.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Last Stronghold (November 1944)
programme.desc: American B-29 high-altitude bomber attacks Japan near the end of World War II.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Mount Belvedere
programme.desc: The Battle of the Gothic Line in 1944.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of the Bulge (December 1944)
programme.desc: The December 1944 battle pitting American forces against German Panzer divisions in the Ardennes Forest.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Mount Hot Rocks (February 19, 1945)
programme.desc: American forces landing on the shores of Iwo Jima encounter Japanese combatants willing to fight to the death.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Trina & Scorpio
programme.desc: Trina is a dancer who always had trouble meeting trustworthy guys, until she met Scorpio, a fellow dancer, online. Will Trina finally get to rendezvous with the only man she's ever loved? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tyler & Amanda
programme.desc: After a year and a half of chatting with her online, Tyler thinks he may have a future with Amanda. But are Tyler's friends correct because they suspect that something isn't right?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Tyreme met the beautiful Tomorrow online over 9 months ago. Tyreme is ready to uproot his life to be with her. Will Nev and Max be able help Tyreme finally meet his Tomorrow? (S5, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Vince's online-ex, Alyssa, is stalking him. This caused real life girlfriend, Liz, to break up with him. Nev and Max help Vince confront Alyssa so he can try to salvage a future with Liz. (S5, ep12)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Whitney & Bre
programme.desc: Whitney met Brenell on a LGBT website four years ago and is head-over-heels in love. Brenell refuses to video chat with her, and Whitney is desperate to know why. Nev and Max investigate. (S4, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: When Sandra learns that her granddaughter, Yasmine, sent money to an online boyfriend, she asks Nev and Max for help. And they soon discover there's much more that Yasmine has been hiding. (S6, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: When Sandra learns that her granddaughter, Yasmine, sent money to an online boyfriend, she asks Nev and Max for help. And they soon discover there's much more that Yasmine has been hiding. (S6, ep7)

programme.title: The Hills: Lauren and Jason: Part 2
programme.desc: When Jason, Lauren's ex flame from Laguna Beach, reappears in her life, Lauren thinks she may not be over him. Meanwhile, Heidi asks if the price of a new job is worth paying for. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: The City: Fashion With A Capital F
programme.desc: Olivia refuses to wear a designer's clothes to their own party, which angers some. Whitney shows Joe Zee her line &amp; gets some harsh criticism. Erin eyes a replacement for Olivia. (S2, ep6)

programme.title: The City: The British Are Coming
programme.desc: Olivia's flubs during Fashion Week leave an opening that Erin quickly tries to fill with a new fashion reporter. Roxy impresses Kelly by helping to produce a huge fashion show. (S2, ep7)

programme.title: The City: Work Horses And Show Ponies
programme.desc: Whitney and Roxy fly to Miami to put on a fashion show for Whitney's clothing line, without Kelly's help! Olivia fights for her job by scoring an interview with Zac Posen. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: The City: One Girl's Trash...
programme.desc: After a successful showing of her line, Whitney's first big sale almost ends in disaster. Erin thinks Olivia is taking undue credit for pulling the perfect look for an ELLE shoot. (S2, ep9)

programme.title: The City: Stage Fight
programme.desc: Roxy &amp; Whitney have a falling out when Roxy dresses a new musician in Whitney's clothing. Erin gains a spot on the Martha Stewart Show &amp; needs Olivia's help to make it a success. (S2, ep10)

programme.title: The City: Roommate Wanted
programme.desc: Roxy &amp; Whitney continue to fight &amp; Roxy looks for her own place. Olivia reluctantly interviews a celebrity wearing Whitney's line &amp; Erin sees another opportunity to replace her. (S2, ep11)

programme.title: The City: Lost In Translation
programme.desc: Whitney faces a challenge when a PR company offers to represent her line, threatening her relationship with Kelly. Erin makes a final play in her effort to get Olivia replaced. (S2, ep12)

programme.title: The City: If She Can Make It Here...
programme.desc: Whitney arrives in New York City during fashion week just in time to start her new career with iconic designer, Diane Von Furstenberg. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: The City: The Truth Will Reveal Itself
programme.desc: Whitney's world is turned upside-down when a boy from her past shows up to warn her that Jay has been fooling around. Olivia decides that befriending Whitney is her new project. (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Raining Men & Meatballs
programme.desc: The Meatballs hold auditions to find a temporary party pal for Deena. Mike reveals to the roommates that he used to be a stripper and they coax him into showing his stuff. (S6, ep12)

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: DNA on one of two teenage girls killed in a similar fashion on a California beach six years apart leads investigators to a suspect who worked inside the police department.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Hunted
programme.desc: Authorities in Colorado race to catch a serial rapist before he attacks again.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Devil's Twin
programme.desc: Identical twin brothers suspected of committing a murder after studying a crime show on TV.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Elizabeth Welsh's husband, Patrick, left her and their two sons what appeared to be a suicide note and disappeared. After investigating the situation, Elizabeth discovered that Patrick is still alive, living in Texas.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Father and Son
programme.desc: A teenager makes a discovery that could prove his mother's death was not suicide.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Pilot
programme.desc: IMF team leader Dan Briggs assembles his team for the first time. His team includes a master of disguise, a femme fatale, an electronics whiz, an incredibly strong man, and a safecracker.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Old Man Out pt. 1
programme.desc: The IMF team goes in as a circus team to rescue Anton Cardinal Vossek, who is being held in the impregnable Seravno Prison.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Old Man Out pt. 2
programme.desc: Rollin manages to avoid the guards and get to the roof but is arrested before he can rescue Vossek.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Memory
programme.desc: The IMF must undermine "the Butcher of the Balkans," Janos Karq, by having his head of security capture an agent, Sparrow, who will then incriminate Karq.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Operation Rogosh
programme.desc: Imry Rogosh is a mass murderer who kills to foment political upheaval. He is targeting Los Angeles, so the IMF knocks him out in a car accident.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Odds On Evil
programme.desc: Prince Iben Kostas plans to use his money to finance a war, the IMF team must stop him before it's too late.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Butterflies - Nature Of Things
programme.desc: Baby Bop is sad because she lost her pet caterpillar, Monty. Barney and the others try to help her find it. Baby Bop is surprised to discover Monty inside a chrysalis. Everyone is excited to find Monty—now a beautiful butterfly!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Coming on Strong
programme.desc: Exercise is good for everybody and every body! From running to touching toes to jumping jacks to some favorite songs and games, Barney and his friends grow strong while having fun with exercise.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Fountain of Fun
programme.desc: While Barney and the children wait for Mr. Boyd's new fountain to be delivered, they have fun playing in and exploring the park.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Good Egg
programme.desc: When the kids find a mysterious, colorful egg in the park, Barney takes them on a trip to Kenya to try to find out what kind of animal could have laid the egg.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ learns that having a pet is a bigger responsibility than he expected when he takes care of a friend’s dog. When Baby Bop’s favorite teddy bear is torn, she wants to take him to the vet for help.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bienvenido, Barney!
programme.desc: Baby Bop's friend Monty the butterfly passes through the park with a flock of friends on their way to Mexico. When Monty gets left behind by his insect friends and family, Barney takes everyone on a visit to Mexico.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Big Little Day
programme.desc: Barney helps Baby Bop and the children discover big and little things in the world around them. And by the end of the day, the kids have learned that big or little, they're all wonderful just the way they are!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Today is the big dance party in the park. Barney tells Baby Bop the story of “The Princess Without a Song to Sing.”

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ, Baby Bop and Riff can hardly wait for the petting zoo that is coming to the park. Riff feels terrible when he accidentally wrecks BJ’s beloved scooter.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Whip It Good
programme.desc: With a motocross bike and a rare stock whip up for grabs, Ton and Allen face one of their toughest competitors yet: their former employee Carolyn, who knows all their tricks, has money to burn and is out for revenge.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hook, Line & Printer
programme.desc: A last-minute auction in Norwalk proves challenging when Ton and Allen go toe-to-toe with a real life cowboy couple. When the dust settles, the guys uncover a 3D printer and a grappling hook gun they can't wait to shoot.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Space Cowboys
programme.desc: With the pawn shop history, Ton and Allen start the next chapter of their careers with a bang. They uncover an antique WWII firearm and a Russian cosmonaut space suit, which could be their biggest find to date...if it's real.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Machine Gun Ton
programme.desc: Ton and Allen battle a pair of vicious female auction hunters who have an axe to grind and bid based on spite rather than strategy. And a gatling gun & suit of armor are worth much less than the guys expected.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: High Flying Ton
programme.desc: A nerdy auction buyer tests Ton and Allen's patience at a big container auction in Ventura. The guys discover a basket and burners for a hot air balloon and a 19th century German single shot rifle!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: You Got Served
programme.desc: After a crushing defeat, the guys leave an auction empty handed and scramble to find new merchandise at a yard sale. But questionable antique tennis rackets and an ancient special effects box may not earn them a cent.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Tough as Nails
programme.desc: CJ seeks to disrupt Allen's search for serenity at a storage auction before the guy's head to a live auction to buy and sell. They uncover an unusual Marilyn Monroe statue, an industrial slip n' slide, and a bed of nails.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: To Pawn or Not To Pawn
programme.desc: On the brink of a major decision, Ton and Allen face-off with Carolyn at an auction in Covina. They win a "special effects unit" that contains big machines for crazy stunt work. The guys decide the fate of the shop.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Quadzilla Attacks!
programme.desc: Extreme Quadzilla ATV, the fastest 4 wheeler ever; a 1910s Remington Derringer and an 1880s Palm Squeezer pistol; revolutionary 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Night of the Digging Dead
programme.desc: A custom-built shark cage; 1900s pathologist's dissection toolkit; 1940s embalming pump and one of the first electric bone saws.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton-Geons & Dragons
programme.desc: While Ton soups up their new truck, Allen heads to an auction solo and encounters Carolyn and CJ. There he discovers LARP weaponry, a sword collection, and falconry gear, before Ton reveals their new ride: Betty.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Baby Talk

programme.desc: Maci confronts her ex about child support; Amber makes a choice; Catelynn and Tyler consider living together; and Farrah considers a big change.

programme.title: Teen Mom: To Be With You

programme.title: Teen Mom: The Last Straw

programme.title: Teen Mom: Trials and Tribulations
programme.desc: Catelynn wants to mend her relationship with her mother; Amber and Gary meet with CPS; Maci decides to move home; Farrah goes to court.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics

programme.title: World War 2 from Above

programme.title: World War 2 from Above
programme.desc: Using drone radar, experts uncover a WWII German trench system revealing a daring allied paratrooper raid to capture it. Also, underwater drone pilots try to identify a lost US vessel.

programme.title: World War 2 from Above

programme.title: World War 2 from Above

programme.title: Borderforce: America's Gatekeepers

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Point of No Return

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Decision

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Truth
programme.desc: Boone tries to find out who murdered his wife.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Miracle
programme.desc: Boone helps prevents a suicide of a handless girl. Da'an wants to use revolutionary Taelon technology to help the girl for propaganda reasons.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Avatar
programme.desc: Boone and Marquette must find James Pike, a mysterious escaped serial killer who rose from the dead.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Old Flame
programme.desc: While plutonium is stolen from a nuclear plant, Boone is is having a tough time concentrating. His mind is on Elyse Chapel, a famous musician and old flame.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Beast Within
programme.desc: Malone goes after a healer that's been filled with the spirit of a demon in exchange for safe release from the village. The girls must set their differences aside and learn to trust each other.

programme.title: The Lost World: Creatures of the Dark
programme.desc: Challenger tries to convince an underground civilization of the dangers of an active volcano ready to blow. In the meantime Veronica, Roxton, and Summerlee try to outrun the Vantu.

programme.title: The Lost World: Tribute
programme.desc: Challenger, Roxton, and Veronica teach the Tintas how to retaliate against the Hikari so that they may be independent. Meanwhile Marguerite, Summerlee, and Malone help a WWI pilot fix his plane.

programme.title: The Lost World: Absolute Power
programme.desc: A powerful light ray from an ancient temple knocks Professor Challenger unconscious. As the explorers try and save him, he occupies an alternate reality in his mind where he has godlike powers.

programme.title: The Lost World: Camelot
programme.desc: In the process of trying to save Marguerite from being betrothed to a teenage king, Malone must face a T-Rex with only a sword and Roxton must joust against Vordred.

programme.title: The Lost World: Unnatural Selection
programme.desc: Challenger comes face to face with an old friend from England, Dr. William Hargrove. Summerlee, Malone, and Marguerite agree to help the Queen of the nymphs and fairies break a curse.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's Weatherfield versus Walford, as Shaun Williamson takes on Vicky Entwistle. In a stunning TVR Chimera, with Paul Laidlaw and Mark Stacy, they're looking to see who can turn the biggest profit at auction.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Globe-trotting Judith Chalmers takes on son Mark Durden-Smith. With a couple of guides--Paul Laidlaw and James Lewis--they visit Worcestershire and Gloucestershire, sorting the tourist tat from treasure in their racy 1970s TR6.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Miles Jupp and Nina Wadia join Thomas Plant and Catherine Southon in Berkshire and Buckinghamshire. Miles discovers Buckinghamshire's chair domination and Nina hears about a group of WWII heroes. All auction proceeds go to Children in Need.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Supermodel Jodie Kidd and chef James Martin are raring to go in Sussex in a pair of Jaguar E types as they race to find antiques for auction. Riding shotgun are Philip Serrell and David Harper to help get them to the finish line in Lewes.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Luke & Amy
programme.desc: Drummer Luke first started talking to nurse Amy when she came to one of his gigs 6 months ago. They had an instant spark but unfortunately every time they try and meet she cancels. (S2, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Taylor & Brad
programme.desc: Taylor is falling in love with Brad despite never having seen his face. Can Oobah and Nella find the man of her dreams, and will Taylor get her happy ever after? (S2, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Hayley & Alex
programme.desc: Oobah is joined by Catfish US royalty Kamie to help Hayley finally meet Alex. But after five months of avoiding phone calls and cancelling on her, will she get her a fairy tale ending? (S2, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Levi & Will
programme.desc: Levi is convinced Will is his dream man and broke up with his boyfriend so they could be together. After always cancelling on Levi, Oobah and Nella suspect something fishy is going on. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alayah & Tommy
programme.desc: Alayah and Tommy started messaging on a live streaming platform. Alayah thinks he could be the one, but when they try and meet, he keeps cancelling. Nella and Oobah help to track him down. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Mario & Hannah
programme.desc: After turning his life around, Mario met his soulmate, Hannah. But she refuses to speak on the phone and won't meet in person. Julie and Oobah try to find out who his dream girl really is. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: DNA on one of two teenage girls killed in a similar fashion on a California beach six years apart leads investigators to a suspect who worked inside the police department.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Hollywood Secrets
programme.desc: The investigation into the 2008 murder of Juliana Redding, an aspiring actress and model and the subsequent trial. Redding was found dead in her Santa Monica, California home

programme.title: 48 Hours: Spies, Lies and Secrets
programme.desc: A report about the death of Shane Todd, a brilliant, high-tech engineer at a Singapore company who, according to his parents, was murdered because he was unwilling to share secrets that could harm the United States.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Black Dahlia Confidential
programme.desc: The brutal murder in 1947 of Elizabeth Short, a young, struggling actress whose body was discovered in a vacant lot in January 1947, has baffled the Los Angeles Police Department for decades

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fight For The Truth
programme.desc: 17-year-old Marty Tankleff was convicted of murdering his adoptive parents in their home. Marty initially confessed, but quickly recanted. He has fought for years for his innocence, as new witnesses have surfaced who could potentially exonerate him.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Whether a true crime television show influenced the investigation of an alleged rape and murder case in Atlanta.

programme.desc: While waiting for Moya to pick their Transport Pod, Zhaan tells Crichton of Moya's adventures after the Gammak base was destroyed.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E9 - Out Of Their Minds
programme.desc: An alien ship fires a weapon at Moya. The blast makes it through and causes everyone's consciousness to jump into another body.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E10 - My Three Crichtons
programme.desc: A strange globe appears on Moya, sucking in Crichton and duplicating him creating two additional people.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E12 - Look At The Princess, Part 2: I Do, I Think

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E13 - Look At The Princess, Part 3: The Maltese Crichton
programme.desc: John Crichton faces eighty years as a statue. That is, until the Scarran Cargn decapitates the statue and drops the head into a vat of acid.
